符号栈                                                                             读入符号                符号栈                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   使用产生式                                                                                               
# <program>                                                                     {                   /*This a test program.*/ int abc ; int 1203 ; int A ; int i ; int n ; int b , c ; int 2 a ; int a2 ; read n ; n = 0 12345 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 ) { abc = abc + i ; } if ( i != n ) n = n + i ; if ( n ) b = b + c ; #   <program>->{<declaration_list_2><statement_list_2>}                                                 
# } <statement_list_2> <declaration_list_2> {                                   int                 abc ; int 1203 ; int A ; int i ; int n ; int b , c ; int 2 a ; int a2 ; read n ; n = 0 12345 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 ) { abc = abc + i ; } if ( i != n ) n = n + i ; if ( n ) b = b + c ; #                                null
# } <statement_list_2> <declaration_list_2>                                     int                 abc ; int 1203 ; int A ; int i ; int n ; int b , c ; int 2 a ; int a2 ; read n ; n = 0 12345 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 ) { abc = abc + i ; } if ( i != n ) n = n + i ; if ( n ) b = b + c ; #                                <declaration_list_2>-><declaration_stat><declaration_list_2>                                        
# } <statement_list_2> <declaration_list_2> <declaration_stat>                  int                 abc ; int 1203 ; int A ; int i ; int n ; int b , c ; int 2 a ; int a2 ; read n ; n = 0 12345 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 ) { abc = abc + i ; } if ( i != n ) n = n + i ; if ( n ) b = b + c ; #                                <declaration_stat>->intID;                                                                          
# } <statement_list_2> <declaration_list_2> ; ID int                            ID                  ; int 1203 ; int A ; int i ; int n ; int b , c ; int 2 a ; int a2 ; read n ; n = 0 12345 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 ) { abc = abc + i ; } if ( i != n ) n = n + i ; if ( n ) b = b + c ; #                                    null
# } <statement_list_2> <declaration_list_2> ; ID                                ;                   int 1203 ; int A ; int i ; int n ; int b , c ; int 2 a ; int a2 ; read n ; n = 0 12345 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 ) { abc = abc + i ; } if ( i != n ) n = n + i ; if ( n ) b = b + c ; #                                      null
# } <statement_list_2> <declaration_list_2> ;                                   int                 1203 ; int A ; int i ; int n ; int b , c ; int 2 a ; int a2 ; read n ; n = 0 12345 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 ) { abc = abc + i ; } if ( i != n ) n = n + i ; if ( n ) b = b + c ; #                                          null
# } <statement_list_2> <declaration_list_2>                                     int                 1203 ; int A ; int i ; int n ; int b , c ; int 2 a ; int a2 ; read n ; n = 0 12345 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 ) { abc = abc + i ; } if ( i != n ) n = n + i ; if ( n ) b = b + c ; #                                          <declaration_list_2>-><declaration_stat><declaration_list_2>                                        
# } <statement_list_2> <declaration_list_2> <declaration_stat>                  int                 1203 ; int A ; int i ; int n ; int b , c ; int 2 a ; int a2 ; read n ; n = 0 12345 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 ) { abc = abc + i ; } if ( i != n ) n = n + i ; if ( n ) b = b + c ; #                                          <declaration_stat>->intID;                                                                          
# } <statement_list_2> <declaration_list_2> ; ID int                            NUM                 ; int A ; int i ; int n ; int b , c ; int 2 a ; int a2 ; read n ; n = 0 12345 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 ) { abc = abc + i ; } if ( i != n ) n = n + i ; if ( n ) b = b + c ; #                                               null
Error 无法接收这个符号,应该为：ID 但实际上是NUM  1203
